app.name: Dictation Master
app.tagline: AI Dictation Assistant · Make Learning Easier

hero.title: Make Dictation Simple and Fun
hero.subtitle: Smart Voice Playback · OCR Text Recognition · Stroke Animation
hero.description: A dictation learning app designed for Hong Kong primary students, supporting Chinese and English with intelligent voice playback, OCR text recognition, HK4762 dictionary, and stroke animations.

features.title: Powerful Features, Easy Learning
features.subtitle: Comprehensive support for your dictation learning needs
features.ocrDesc: Take a photo or select an image to automatically recognize text and quickly create dictations
features.ttsDesc: Supports Cantonese, Mandarin, and English with adjustable speed, repeat count, and intervals
features.dictionaryDesc: Contains 4762 common characters from HK Education Bureau with stroke animations and pronunciations
features.reviewDesc: Three review modes: card, list, and stroke, with support for marking mastered words
features.cloudDesc: All dictations automatically backed up to cloud after login, seamlessly sync across devices
features.freeDesc: Core features permanently free to use, enjoy full experience without subscription

pricing.title: Choose Your Plan
pricing.subtitle: Flexible pricing options to meet different needs

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find the answers you need
faq.q1: What are the limitations of the free version?
faq.a1: The free version includes all core features but displays ads. Subscribe to remove ads and enjoy Azure AI premium voices.
faq.a2: Supports Traditional Chinese (Cantonese), Simplified Chinese (Mandarin), and English.
faq.q3: How do I cancel my subscription?
faq.a3: You can cancel your subscription anytime in the App Store or Google Play subscription management.
faq.a4: Local data is stored on your device. After logging in, all data is automatically synced to Firebase cloud.

footer.description: A dictation learning app designed for Hong Kong primary students
